title: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Malynivka, Chervone, Bilohirya and Scherbaky of Zaporizhzhia region. Russian aviati...
content: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Malynivka, Chervone, Bilohirya and Scherbaky of Zaporizhzhia region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Orikhiv, Novodanylivka and Robotyne of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
